name: Crazy Quadcopter
description:
You have been hired by the Nozama e-commerce monopoly to deliver packages to their preferred customers using their new Quadcopter Delivery Service.

Navigate your drone through spinning saws, flying fish, cannons, and a host of other hazards.

Play every level and episode completely free with the exception of in-app purchases for coins only.

Features:
- Evade a barrage of hazards
- Deliver packages to designated drop zones
- Pickup packages for returns
- Simple and easy touch controls
- Collect coins to upgrade your drone
- Climb the leader board on every level
- Complete level goals for a coin bonus
- Race through gates to unlock bonuses
- Upgrade your copter's motor, hull, shields, and battery
- More episodes and levels to come
- Designed for all ages
- Play for free!
